items.title: VI Live: Demb√©l√© voltooit snelle herstelwerkzaamheden voor PSG in Parijse derby
items.summary: In deze VI Live volgen we de hoogtepunten in verschillende competities. Met onder meer aandacht voor Leeds United - Manchester United, Fulham - Liverpool, de Afrika Cup en Real Madrid - Real Betis.

items.title: Neville: Amorim not happy with hierarchy | Carra: He's not good enough
items.summary: Gary Neville belives Ruben Amorim's recent comments to the media are a signal that the Manchester United boss is not happy with the Old Trafford hierarchy.

items.title: Amorim hits out: I'm Utd manager, not the coach
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has raised doubts over his future at Manchester United by saying he wants to be the "manager, not the coach."

items.title: Sources: Rosenior in London, close to Chelsea job
items.summary: Chelsea are moving closer to the appointment of Liam Rosenior as their new head coach after the 41-year-old arrived in London on Sunday, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Managerless Chelsea hold City to late draw
items.summary: Enzo Fern√°ndez grabbed a stoppage-time equaliser as managerless Chelsea snatched a 1-1 draw at title-chasing Manchester City.

items.title: Kameroen treft Marokko in kwartfinale na nipte zege op Zuid-Afrika
items.summary: Kameroen wordt in de kwartfinale van de Afrika Cup de tegenstander van Marokko. Zondagavond rekende het land van sterspeler Bryan Mbeumo af met Zuid-Afrika, met dank aan een oude plaaggeest van PSV.

items.title: Amorim wants control at Man United, but his outburst could cost him his job
items.summary: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim is frustrated at not being able to choose his transfers himself. But by speaking out, he has put his job in danger.

items.title: No Maresca, no problem? Chelsea's late draw at Man City a blow for Guardiola & Co.
items.summary: All signs pointed to a routine Man City win, yet Enzo Fernandez' late goal ensured Chelsea went home happy.

items.title: Hattrickheld Garc√≠a snapt geringe Real-speeltijd: 'Mbapp√© is de beste ter wereld'
items.summary: Gonzalo Garc√≠a snapt goed dat hij de back-up is van Kylian Mbapp√© bij Real Madrid. De hattrickheld van deze zondag schoot zichzelf tegen Real Betis in een rijtje met onder meer Ronaldo Nazario en Ruud van Nistelrooij.

items.title: Garrett breaks NFL sack record in final game of season
items.summary: Cleveland Browns defensive end Myles Garrett broke the NFL's single-season sack record against the Cincinnati Bengals on Sunday.

items.title: Beloftencoach Chelsea bejubelt punt bij City en 'ruimt veld meteen voor opvolger'
items.summary: Calum McFarlane beleefde zondag een bijzondere dag. Normaal coacht hij de beloften van Chelsea, maar na het ontslag van Enzo Maresca mocht hij het plots met de hoofdmacht opnemen tegen Manchester City . En daar lijkt het ook meteen bij te blijven.

items.title: City held at home as Chelsea snatch stoppage‚Äëtime equaliser
items.summary: Enzo Fernandez scores a stoppage-time equaliser as Chelsea end a tumultuous week by claiming a worthy Premier League point at title-chasing Manchester City.

items.title: Inter zoekt vervanger voor Dumfries en komt uit bij Jo√£o Cancelo
items.summary: Internazionale gaat haar best doen om een vervanger te halen voor Denzel Dumfries. President Beppe Marotta legt uit dat de Nederlander nog wel een poos uit de roulatie is en dat de Champions League-finalist van vorig seizoen daarom kijkt naar alternatieven. Jo√£o Cancelo lijkt een voorname kandidaat om terug te keren naar het Estadio Giuseppe Meazza.

items.title: Leeds denied win as Cunha hits back for Man Utd
items.summary: Brenden Aaronson breaks the deadlock, before Matheus Cunha levels just three minutes later, as Leeds and Manchester United share the points at Elland road.

items.title: Second‚Äëhalf lift sees Newcastle ease past Palace
items.summary: Newcastle United climb to ninth in the table, as captain Bruno Guimaraes inspires the hosts to victory with a hard-fought win over Crystal Palace at St James' Park.

items.title: Brilliant Brobbey goal earns Sunderland late draw as Spurs booed
items.summary: Sunderland increase the pressure on Tottenham Hotspur head coach Thomas Frank as Brian Brobbey's late equaliser gives the Black Cats a point.

items.title: Reed's stoppage‚Äëtime strike earns Fulham dramatic draw with Liverpool
items.summary: Harrison Reed's superb 97th-minute equaliser earns the hosts a dramatic point, cancelling out Cody Gakpo's goal from just three minutes earlier, as Fulham deny a Liverpool comeback in a Premier League thriller.

items.title: Fern√°ndez stuns Manchester City with late equaliser for managerless Chelsea
items.summary: It would have been easy for Pep Guardiola and Manchester City to think that this was a good time to face Chelsea. The London club had crashed in December, their Premier League form awful and the rising tensions between Enzo Maresca and the board would explode on New Year‚Äôs Eve. There have not been many managerial changes on the very first day of a year and this one left Calum McFarlane, the club‚Äôs under-21 coach, thrust in as the interim manager. Never before had he taken charge of a single senior game. Continue reading...

items.title: Enzo Fernandez grabs stoppage-time equaliser as Man City slip up in title race!
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Manchester City‚Äôs match against Chelsea in the Premier League.

items.title: Man City pegged back by managerless Chelsea as more ground lost in title race
items.summary: Manchester City lost more ground on Premier League leaders Arsenal after Enzo Fernandez rescued a late 1-1 draw for managerless Chelsea at a snowy Etihad Stadium.
